Description_lang: Tormmok will gain Master of Arms, allowing him to repair your armor and weapons in the field.

name_blz.pt_BR: Benefício de Tormmok: Mestre de Armas
name_blz.it_IT: Bonus di Tormmok: Signore delle Armi
name_blz.zh_TW: 托爾瑪克特殊能力：武具大師

description_blz.en_US: Tormmok will gain Master of Arms, allowing him to repair your armor and weapons in the field.
description_blz.es_MX: Tormmok obtendrá Maestro armero, lo que le permitirá reparar tu armadura y armas en el campo.
description_blz.pt_BR: Tormmok receberá Mestre de Armas, permitindo que ele repare sua armadura e suas armas no campo de batalha.
description_blz.de_DE: Tormmok erhält 'Waffenmeister', wodurch er unterwegs Reparaturen an Eurer Rüstung und Euren Waffen vornehmen kann.
description_blz.en_GB: Tormmok will gain Master of Arms, allowing him to repair your armor and weapons in the field.
description_blz.es_ES: Tormmok obtendrá Maestro armero, lo que le permite reparar tu armadura y tus armas en el campo.
description_blz.fr_FR: Tormmok obtiendra Maître d’armes, ce qui lui permettra de réparer vos armes et armures sur le terrain.
description_blz.it_IT: Tormmok ottiene l'abilità Signore delle Armi, e può riparare armi e armature sul campo di battaglia.
description_blz.ru_RU: Тормок получает способность "Мастер владения оружием", позволяющую ему ремонтировать доспехи и оружие в полевых условиях.
description_blz.ko_KR: 토르모크가 무기의 대가 능력을 얻어, 야외에서 플레이어의 방어구와 무기를 수리할 수 있습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 托爾瑪克將會獲得武具大師，可在野外幫你修理護甲和武器。
description_blz.zh_CN: 托莫克将获得武器大师技能，让他可以在战场上修复你的盔甲和武器。
